entry.title: Secure Electron IPC
entry.summary: In this post we’ll look at how to do secure IPC (Inter-Process-Communication) in Electron. Why does it matter? The RCE Problem Server Side electron.js preload.js Client Side Why does it matter? To keep it short, insecure IPC can lead to full blown RCE (Remote Code Execute). How?
